com.jde.model.stage

Class Stage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.stage.Stage

  • public class Stage
extends java.lang.Object
    This Stage class is the main engine of the game, it contains the player, bullets and enemies
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)
